metadata.title: CVE-2021-30596 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect security UI in Navigation in Google Chrome on Android prior to92.0.4515.131 allowed a remote attacker to spoof the contents of theOmnibox (URL bar) via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
